13_Bug Catcher Weedle.name: Bug Catcher Weedle
13_Bug Catcher Weedle.description: Beware of its net. It hides in grass and bushes where it hunts small bugs for its collection.

16_Papel Picado Pidgey.name: Papel Picado Pidgey
16_Papel Picado Pidgey.description: A common sight in cities and villages. It flies between homes to hang Papel Picado.

25_Alola Cap Pikachu.name: Alola Cap Pikachu
25_Alola Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Alola region.

25_Hoenn Cap Pikachu.name: Hoenn Cap Pikachu
25_Hoenn Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Hoenn region.

25_Kalos Cap Pikachu.name: Kalos Cap Pikachu
25_Kalos Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Kalos region.

25_Original Cap Pikachu.name: Original Cap Pikachu
25_Original Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu is wearing its Trainer’s cap. Since the cap’s not the right size, the fit is a bit loose.

25_Partner Cap Pikachu.name: Partner Cap Pikachu
25_Partner Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed as the two overcame many hardships together.

ja: キミにきめたキャップ

25_Sinnoh Cap Pikachu.name: Sinnoh Cap Pikachu
25_Sinnoh Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Sinnoh region.

25_Unova Cap Pikachu.name: Unova Cap Pikachu
25_Unova Cap Pikachu.description: This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap—proof of the strong bond Pikachu and its partner formed during adventures across the Unova region.

37_Birthday Cake Alopix.name: Birthday Cake Alopix
37_Birthday Cake Alopix.description: It looks like a birthday cake come to life. If you approach it because it's cute, it could give you a slice of cake as a reward.

37_Rudolph Vulpix.name: Rudolph Vulpix
37_Rudolph Vulpix.description: In its belly burns a fire, which Vulpix spits out in the form of fireballs. When young, this Pokémon has but one white tail. As the Pokémon matures, this single tail splits into six.

46_Flower Paras.name: Flower Paras
46_Flower Paras.description: Burrows close to trees to cover itself. The flowers on its back gives it all the energy it needs.

50_Angel Diglett.name: Angel Diglett
50_Angel Diglett.description: It flies through the sky at midnight. It searches for a Christmas tree without a tree topper so it can sit on top.

52_Egg Painter Meowth.name: Egg Painter Meowth
52_Egg Painter Meowth.description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the forests to look for dropped eggs to paint.

82_Eggneton.name: Eggneton
82_Eggneton.description: This Pokémon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most chocolate eggs are found when Eggneton approaches.

83_Umbrella Farfetch'd.name: Umbrella Farfetch'd
83_Umbrella Farfetch'd.description: It doesn’t like to be in the rain. That’s why it always brings its umbrella.

88_Cube Slime Grimer.name: Cube Slime Grimer
88_Cube Slime Grimer.description: Appears in filthy dungeons. Thrives by sucking up metals like swords and armor from adventurers.

103_Celebrating Alolan Exeggutor ft. Kom.name: Celebrating Alolan Exeggutor ft. Komala
103_Celebrating Alolan Exeggutor ft. Kom.description: Its three heads think independently. However, they respect each other and never appear to squabble.

105_Candy Cane Marowak.name: Candy Cane Marowak
105_Candy Cane Marowak.description: At Christmas eve, it replaces the bone with a candy cane to snack on a candy cane. This is the only time it lays down the bone.

114_Pasta Bolognese Tangela.name: Pasta Bolognese Tangela
114_Pasta Bolognese Tangela.description: It is cloaked entirely in al dente pasta and meatballs, preventing any glimpse of its true identity. The pasta, meatballs and various spices make for a hearty meal.

115_Egg Hunter Kangaskhan.name: Egg Hunter Kangaskhan
115_Egg Hunter Kangaskhan.description: There are records of Kangaskhan hiding chocolate eggs for their children to find on Easter.

124_Mrs. Claus Jynx.name: Mrs. Claus Jynx
124_Mrs. Claus Jynx.description: Appears to move to a rhythm of Christmas, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks to the jingle bells.

131_Anniversary Lapras.name: Anniversary Lapras
131_Anniversary Lapras.description: This gentle Pokémon loves to give people rides on its back. During the celebration, it covers itself with cake cream for everyone to enjoy.

131_Egg Nest Lapras.name: Egg Nest Lapras
131_Egg Nest Lapras.description: A gentle soul that can read the minds of others. It can ferry eggs across the sea on its back.

132_Cracked Ditto.name: Cracked Ditto
132_Cracked Ditto.description: It can transform into anything. It likes to fool people during Easter by transforming into an Easter egg.

fields.Evolution: **Autumn Eevee** evolves to **Autumn Leafeon** using a Leaf Stone.

143_Santa Snorlax.name: Santa Snorlax
143_Santa Snorlax.description: This glutton appears in houses without warning and devours the entirety of their milk and cookies—such occurrences have long been counted among the merriest of surprises.

149_Conductor Dragonite.name: Conductor Dragonite
149_Conductor Dragonite.description: It can fly despite its big and bulky physique. It circles the North Pole in just half an hour.

149_Guardian Dragonite.name: Guardian Dragonite
149_Guardian Dragonite.description: It is said that this Pokémon lives somewhere deep in the mountains and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

154_Shamrock Meganium.name: Shamrock Meganium
154_Shamrock Meganium.description: The aroma that rises from the flowers contains a substance that makes anyone happy.

161_Archery Sentret.name: Archery Sentret
161_Archery Sentret.description: They take turns helping with archery when the team is finished. They sometimes run in too fast and jump behind a target for protection.

166_Harvesting Ledian.name: Harvesting Ledian
166_Harvesting Ledian.description: It is said that in lands with clean air, where the stars fill the sky, there live Ledian in countless numbers. They gather during harvest season to help prepare for winter.

179_Christmas Mareep.name: Christmas Mareep
179_Christmas Mareep.description: If you hang lights in its fleece, it will generate enough electricity to turn them on. Don’t pet it, you’ll get a painful shock.

181_Pride Ampharos.name: Pride Ampharos
181_Pride Ampharos.description: When it gets dark, the rainbow light from its bright, shiny horns form a rainbow in the sky.

182_Music Box Bellossom.name: Music Box Bellossom
182_Music Box Bellossom.description: When the jolly snowfall season starts, cranking the spring draws it out to dance in the open.

182_Pride Bellossom.name: Pride Bellossom
182_Pride Bellossom.description: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They go in groups and invite everyone to join in on the ritual.

ja: クリスマスウソッキー

194_Skater Wooper.name: Skater Wooper
194_Skater Wooper.description: Wooper usually lives in water. However, it occasionally comes out onto land in search of food. There it discovered a skate shoe which made it more mobile on land!

195_Camp Leader Quagsire.name: Camp Leader Quagsire
195_Camp Leader Quagsire.description: A loving Pokémon. It cares about everyone in camp and is there for you when you need.

ja: クリスマスヤミカラス

201_Pride Unown.name: Pride Unown
201_Pride Unown.description: Its shape resembles the non-binary symbol that is known throughout the world.

216_Sweater Teddiursa.name: Sweater Teddiursa
216_Sweater Teddiursa.description: Before it gets cold in wintertime, its habit is to hoard warm sweaters and blankets to make its home cosy.

225_Santa Delibird.name: Santa Delibird
225_Santa Delibird.description: It has a generous habit of giving out presents to people and Pokémon, so it’s always shopping around for more presents.

235_Fishing Smeargle ft. Magikarp.name: Fishing Smeargle ft. Magikarp
235_Fishing Smeargle ft. Magikarp.description: It gets its food by using its tail like a fishing rod. It catches more than 50 fish every day.

ja: クリスマスミルタンク

256_Chicombusken.name: Chicombusken
256_Chicombusken.description: Chicombusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running after trainers in their homes. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.

258_Moon Fairy Mudkip.name: Moon Fairy Mudkip
258_Moon Fairy Mudkip.description: The fin on Mudkip's head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense magic in the air, this Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.

262_Evil Mightyena.name: Evil Mightyena
262_Evil Mightyena.description: It is always the leader of a pack of Mightyenas, it will never ally with another Evil Mightyena, nor will it ever listen to any other Pokémon or humans.

263_Pride Zigzagoon.name: Pride Zigzagoon
263_Pride Zigzagoon.description: Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This Pokémon does so because it is very curious, especially with parades and celebrations in town.

267_Hatching Beautifly.name: Hatching Beautifly
267_Hatching Beautifly.description: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient searching for hidden chocolate eggs in gardens. It rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering eggs.

270_Sombrero Lotad.name: Sombrero Lotad
270_Sombrero Lotad.description: Its sombrero is its pride, which it shows off during Día de Muertos.

274_Bird Nest Nuzleaf.name: Bird Nest Nuzleaf
274_Bird Nest Nuzleaf.description: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf's grass flute lets birds whistle in joy.

ja: クリスマスサーナイト

282_Pride Gardevoir & Delphox.name: Pride Gardevoir & Delphox
282_Pride Gardevoir & Delphox.description: They have the ability to read the future. If they sense impending danger to a friend, these Pokémon are said to unleash their psychokinetic and flame energy at full power.

284_Pride Masquerain.name: Pride Masquerain
284_Pride Masquerain.description: Masquerain shows love with the colourful pattern on its antennas. This Pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.

286_Sage of Foliage.name: Sage of Foliage
286_Sage of Foliage.description: The mushrooms on its tail give off a toxic cloud. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

298_Easter Egg Azurill.name: Easter Egg Azurill
298_Easter Egg Azurill.description: It distracts by flinging around its tail in the bushes, showing as if it’s an Easter egg. When close enough, it jumps out of the bushes to surprise you.

303_Overgrown Mawile.name: Overgrown Mawile
303_Overgrown Mawile.description: Attached to its head is a huge set of several jaws formed by horns. These can chew through iron beams.

311_Pyjama Plusle & Minun.name: Pyjama Plusle & Minun
311_Pyjama Plusle & Minun.description: During the Winter, Plusle & Minun use their sparks to light candles and start a cozy fire to gather around.

316_Temaki Gulpin.name: Temaki Gulpin
316_Temaki Gulpin.description: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body along with beansprouts and other fillings, all wrapped in nori.

317_Pile of Leaves Swalot.name: Pile of Leaves Swalot
317_Pile of Leaves Swalot.description: It can swallow its enemies in one gulp. It secretes a dirty, damp-smelling fluid from within the leaves surrounding its body.

325_Ornaments Spoink.name: Ornaments Spoink
325_Ornaments Spoink.description: Spoink keeps an ornament on top of its head. The ornament functions to amplify this Pokémon's Christmas powers. It is therefore on a constant search for a bigger one.

327_Voodoo Spinda.name: Voodoo Spinda
327_Voodoo Spinda.description: No two Voodoo Spinda have the same pattern of stitches and colours. Their tottering steps hinder the aim of foes.

338_Soluna.name: Soluna
338_Soluna.description: A fused Pokémon, never seen before. It floats in the air, staring silently.

343_Leafy Baltoy.name: Leafy Baltoy
343_Leafy Baltoy.description: It moves by spinning on its foot. It makes little leafy whirlwinds with its movement.

350_Pride Milotic.name: Pride Milotic
350_Pride Milotic.description: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. For Pride, they wear the colours of blue, yellow and pink to represent Pan.

354_Banshee Banette.name: Banshee Banette
354_Banshee Banette.description: Strong feelings of grief turned a soul into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

355_Sugar Duskull.name: Sugar Duskull
355_Sugar Duskull.description: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. Once this Pokémon chooses a target, it will dance around them until the break of dawn.

361_Tent Snorunt.name: Tent Snorunt
361_Tent Snorunt.description: It is said that visiting a Tent Snorunt will give you luck. It can withstand heat of 110 degrees Fahrenheit.

363_Ice Cream Spheals.name: Ice Cream Spheals
363_Ice Cream Spheals.description: During the summer when the weather warms, Ice Cream Spheals prefer living in groups on the cone to keep each other cool.

366_Clamacaron.name: Clamacaron
366_Clamacaron.description: It makes a single peach flavored pearl during its lifetime. The pearl along with the crumbly shell is said to amplify the fruity flavor.

fields.Evolution: **Autumn Turtwig** evolves to **Autumn Grotle** starting from level 18, which evolves to **Autumn Torterra** starting from level 32.

387_Treasure Turtwig.name: Treasure Turtwig
387_Treasure Turtwig.description: The shell on its back carries a cauldron. On a very happy Turtwig, the cauldron is full of gold.

fields.Evolution: **Autumn Grotle** evolves from **Autumn Turtwig** starting from level 18 and evolves to **Autumn Torterra** starting from level 32.
**Autumn Torterra** evolves from **Autumn Grotle** starting from level 32, which evolves from **Autumn Turtwig** starting from level 18.

393_Pride Piplup.name: Pride Piplup
393_Pride Piplup.description: It's an adorable little thing - as cute as any child - but it's also prideful, unwilling to let others tell it what to do.

399_Easter Bidoof.name: Easter Bidoof
399_Easter Bidoof.description: It lives in groups by the water. During Easter, it plays the role of Easter Bunny for nearby villages to entertain the children.

402_Wizard Kricketune.name: Wizard Kricketune
402_Wizard Kricketune.description: By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its belly, it produces magic.

407_Pride Roserade.name: Pride Roserade
407_Pride Roserade.description: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with poses of all sorts to show its strength and pride.

413_Snowmadam.name: Snowmadam
413_Snowmadam.description: Its cloak looks to be made of soft, fluffy snow, but don't be deceived. This packed, hardened snow offers it sturdy protection and gives frostbite to any who touch it.

419_Ranger Floatzel.name: Ranger Floatzel
419_Ranger Floatzel.description: It is a common sight around cave entrances. It is known to rescue people and keep evil at bay.

421_Blossom Cherrim.name: Blossom Cherrim
421_Blossom Cherrim.description: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud. The more blossom it has, the darker their past.

426_Drifboy.name: Drifboy
426_Drifboy.description: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But nobody knows where you end up…

427_Egg Basket Buneary.name: Egg Basket Buneary
427_Egg Basket Buneary.description: Buneary can crack eggs by rolling up their ears and then striking with the force created by unrolling them. This attack is useful for hard boiled eggs.

428_Doll Lopunny.name: Doll Lopunny
428_Doll Lopunny.description: Once the hot seasons end, its coat will be replaced with soft wooly fur that holds a lot of insulating air in preparation for the colder weather.

454_Rogue Toxicroak.name: Rogue Toxicroak
454_Rogue Toxicroak.description: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin that is used for battles in dungeons.

455_Overgrown Carnivine.name: Overgrown Carnivine
455_Overgrown Carnivine.description: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling flowers and gulps them down.

461_Sage of Shadows.name: Sage of Shadows
461_Sage of Shadows.description: It travels with other sages, leaving signs for one another on trees and rocks. It brings down its prey with shadow magic.

fields.Evolution: **Autumn Leafeon** evolves from **Autumn Eevee** using a Leaf Stone.

471_Snowglobe Glaceon.name: Snowglobe Glaceon
471_Snowglobe Glaceon.description: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

474_Porygon-X.name: Porygon-X
474_Porygon-X.description: An attempt to fix its faulty programming failed, corrupting it further and resulting in this glitched form.

ja: クリスマスエルレイド

497_Wooden Serperior.name: Wooden Serperior
497_Wooden Serperior.description: With its tail, Serperior holds a lantern to celebrate Lunar New Year. Its wooden body radiates charm and grace.

509_Bard Purrloin.name: Bard Purrloin
509_Bard Purrloin.description: Its cute music act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It disappears in the night after every performance.

521_Lovebird Unfezant.name: Lovebird Unfezant
521_Lovebird Unfezant.description: Males swing their head plumage to attract females. The females' flying abilities are shown to impress the male.

524_Sage of Snaring.name: Sage of Snaring
524_Sage of Snaring.description: When it detects a noise, it starts to move. The energy core inside it can be used to make objects fly.

528_Cloubat.name: Cloubat
528_Cloubat.description: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits thunder sounds strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.

531_Elf Audino.name: Elf Audino
531_Elf Audino.description: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Elf Audino can find out other creatures’ wishes and desires.

532_Timber Timburr.name: Timber Timburr
532_Timber Timburr.description: It fights by swinging an axe around. It is close to evolving when it can chop down small trees without difficulty.

542_Leavanette.name: Leavanette
542_Leavanette.description: This Pokémon has strong attacking instincts. The leaf-like arms are sharp enough to slice a thick steel beam in half with one stroke.

549_La Catrina Hisuian Lilligant.name: La Catrina Hisuian Lilligant
549_La Catrina Hisuian Lilligant.description: The fragrance of its flower differs slightly on Día de Muertos, its scent becomes sweeter. Sniffing the aroma calms your heart and mind.

549_Poinsettia Lilligant.name: Poinsettia Lilligant
549_Poinsettia Lilligant.description: Essential oils made from Lilligant poinsettia flowers have a sublime scent. These are in a lot of homes during Christmas.

562_Honoring Yamask.name: Honoring Yamask
562_Honoring Yamask.description: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. They search for their families on Día de Muertos, connecting with loved ones and sharing memories of its former life.

570_Santa H. Zorua.name: Santa H. Zorua
570_Santa H. Zorua.description: It changes into the forms of others to disguise itself while bringing presents. Apparently, its true form is Santa Claus!

571_Foroark.name: Foroark
571_Foroark.description: If it thinks humans are going to discover its den, Foroark will scare them almost to death.

572_Pyjama Minccino.name: Pyjama Minccino
572_Pyjama Minccino.description: These Pokémon like things neat and tidy during Christmas. They are always watching the house and helping decorate the Christmas tree.

575_Pumpkin Gothorita.name: Pumpkin Gothorita
575_Pumpkin Gothorita.description: Using its psychic power, it arranges pumpkins to form the shapes of evil spirits. Some people believe this Pokémon came from outer space.

576_Monarch Gothitelle.name: Monarch Gothitelle
576_Monarch Gothitelle.description: Instead of gazing at the stars for the future, Monarch Gothitelle gazes into the past, through the souls of the departed, in order to share favored memories with their loved ones on Día de Muertos.

580_Baby Ducklett.name: Baby Ducklett
580_Baby Ducklett.description: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They can swim from day one and start diving after the first week.

580_Waterpolo Ducklett.name: Waterpolo Ducklett
580_Waterpolo Ducklett.description: These bird Pokémon are excellent at waterpolo. They swim around in the water throwing balls and plants at each other to train.

581_Flower Family Swanna.name: Flower Family Swanna
581_Flower Family Swanna.description: Swanna start to gather flowers at dawn. It makes flower crowns for the new duckletts.

585_Reindeer Deerling.name: Reindeer Deerling
585_Reindeer Deerling.description: The color and scent of their fur change to match the Christmas celebration. People use it to mark the Christmas days.

586_Winter Event Sawsbuck.name: Winter Event Sawsbuck
586_Winter Event Sawsbuck.description: It’s said that Sawsbuck are calm and easy to tame during the season when they take on this form, so it’s the perfect time to make one your partner.

590_Foombrella.name: Foombrella
590_Foombrella.description: It lures humans with the hat that looks just like an umbrella, then releases poison spores.

608_Paper Lantern Lampent.name: Paper Lantern Lampent
608_Paper Lantern Lampent.description: This Pokémon appears on Lunar New Year, just before the celebration starts, so kids wait for its arrival.

623_Hero Golurk.name: Hero Golurk
623_Hero Golurk.description: The Hero Golurk, restored through the valiant efforts of the Sinister Sages, actively protects other Pokémon from the Foul Beasts that roam the land. It seeks to make things right with those it has hurt.

623_Ruined Golurk.name: Ruined Golurk
623_Ruined Golurk.description: Its seal shattered, the infernal energy inside the Ruined Golurk seeps from within. The Ruined Golurk now roams the ruined forest, as it slowly loses grasp of the identity it once had.

626_Minotaur Bouffalant.name: Minotaur Bouffalant
626_Minotaur Bouffalant.description: These Pokémon live in solitude. Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

627_Pride Rufflet.name: Pride Rufflet
627_Pride Rufflet.description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

650_Cooking Chespin.name: Cooking Chespin
650_Cooking Chespin.description: The quills on its head are usually sprouts. Nearing winter, the sprouts turn yellow, announcing the harvest season.

654_Sage of Flames.name: Sage of Flames
654_Sage of Flames.description: When the staff is held high, the flame at the top will give a bright light. The sage can use it to lead the way in the darkest places.

656_Toadsie.name: Toadsie
656_Toadsie.description: It protects its skin by covering its body in mud and leaves. Beneath the innocence, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings, looking for any flies it can catch.

659_Nibbling Bunnelby.name: Nibbling Bunnelby
659_Nibbling Bunnelby.description: It’s very sensitive to smell. It knows where the best carrots are found.

660_Bonnersby.name: Bonnersby
660_Bonnersby.description: As powerful as an excavator, it can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. Watch out, or you might become a pancake.

667_Lion Dancer Litleo.name: Lion Dancer Litleo
667_Lion Dancer Litleo.description: This hot-blooded Pokémon is filled with energy. When it gets excited or starts dancing, its body gets hot.

668_Alebrije Pyroar.name: Alebrije Pyroar
668_Alebrije Pyroar.description: Its vibrant, colorful fur shines brightly as it flies through the sky, guiding spirits to their loved ones on Día de Muertos.

669_Flower Fairy Flabébé.name: Flower Fairy Flabébé
669_Flower Fairy Flabébé.description: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long and even sleeps on the flower to draw energy to heal.

670_Eternal Flower Floette.name: Eternal Flower Floette
670_Eternal Flower Floette.description: Terrifying energy is concealed within its ominous flower, but Floette still swings it about innocently.

674_Pacifier Pancham.name: Pacifier Pancham
674_Pacifier Pancham.description: When Pancham are born, they don’t start glaring immediately—they only begin to glare once they swap their pacifier for a leaf to chew on.

678_Snoozing Meowstic.name: Snoozing Meowstic
678_Snoozing Meowstic.description: The defensive instinct of the males is strong. It's when they're protecting their partners that they unleash their full power.

679_Cursed Blade Honedge.name: Cursed Blade Honedge
679_Cursed Blade Honedge.description: Apparently, this Pokémon is born when an evil spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

680_Fancy Cutlery Doublade.name: Fancy Cutlery Doublade
680_Fancy Cutlery Doublade.description: The two cutlery employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between fork and knife to spear and slice food elegantly.

700_Pride Sylveon.name: Pride Sylveon
700_Pride Sylveon.description: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbon-like feelers to show love.

700_Sylvirus.name: Sylvirus
700_Sylvirus.description: Eevee’s unstable genes have led to a genetic malfunction during evolution, resulting in Sylvirus’ misshapen and jagged appearance.

704_Goomy Brûlée.name: Goomy Brûlée
704_Goomy Brûlée.description: It's covered in a caramel membrane that makes any person desire a bite.

704_Muddy Goomy.name: Muddy Goomy
704_Muddy Goomy.description: Its source of protection is its muddy, germ-laden brown puddle. Anyone who touches it needs some thorough hand-washing.

707_Baby Toy Klefki.name: Baby Toy Klefki
707_Baby Toy Klefki.description: These key collectors love to play around with toy keys when they live in a household with babies.

710_Large Pumpkaboo.name: Large Pumpkaboo
710_Large Pumpkaboo.description: Large Pumpkaboo are said to be the product of areas where many lost souls lingered.

710_Pumpkaboo Spice Latte.name: Pumpkaboo Spice Latte
710_Pumpkaboo Spice Latte.description: Its body is full to the brim of sweet pumpkin spice latte. It always stays steaming hot.

710_Small Pumpkaboo.name: Small Pumpkaboo
710_Small Pumpkaboo.description: Small Pumpkaboo are said to be the product of areas where few lost souls lingered.

710_Super Pumpkaboo.name: Super Pumpkaboo
710_Super Pumpkaboo.description: Massive Pumpkaboo are said to be the product of areas where a great number of lost souls lingered.

711_Large Gourgeist.name: Large Gourgeist
711_Large Gourgeist.description: A large-sized Pumpkaboo evolves into a large-sized Gourgeist. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.

711_Small Gourgeist.name: Small Gourgeist
711_Small Gourgeist.description: A small-sized Pumpkaboo evolves into a small-sized Gourgeist. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.

711_Super Gourgeist.name: Super Gourgeist
711_Super Gourgeist.description: A supersized Pumpkaboo evolves into a supersized Gourgeist. Its bodily proportions also get passed on to its descendants.

722_Christmas Rowlet.name: Christmas Rowlet
722_Christmas Rowlet.description: During the day, it builds up energy via photosynthesis. At night, it flies silenty through the sky, scouting for the santa to bring his presents.

733_Pride Toucannon.name: Pride Toucannon
733_Pride Toucannon.description: Known for forming harmonious couples no matter which gender, this Pokémon is brought to wedding ceremonies as a good luck charm.

737_Camper Charjabug.name: Camper Charjabug
737_Camper Charjabug.description: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

741_Cheerleader Oricorio.name: Cheerleader Oricorio
741_Cheerleader Oricorio.description: It lifts the team spirit with its cheerful dance moves. They are so good at dancing, that even the opponents gets a spirit boost.

756_Overgrown Shiinotic.name: Overgrown Shiinotic
756_Overgrown Shiinotic.description: If you see a light deep in a forest at night, run as far as you can. Shiinotic will get you with its overgrown roots.

757_Fire Fairy Salandit.name: Fire Fairy Salandit
757_Fire Fairy Salandit.description: Its venom sacs produce a fluid that this Pokémon then heats up with the flame in its tail. This process creates Salandit's fire wings.

759_Polar Stufful.name: Polar Stufful
759_Polar Stufful.description: The way it protects itself by flailing its arms may be an adorable sight, but stay well away. This is flailing that can snap thick tree trunks.

760_Fazwear.name: Fazwear
760_Fazwear.description: This Pokémon has the habit of chasing its companions. Many trainers have left this world after last being seen with it.

762_Egg Searching Steenee.name: Egg Searching Steenee
762_Egg Searching Steenee.description: Any Corvisquire that pecks at this Pokémon will be greeted with a smack from the bag its wearing.

764_Pride Comfey.name: Pride Comfey
764_Pride Comfey.description: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When the colours form a rainbow, it's the happiest it can ever be.

764_Wreath Comfey.name: Wreath Comfey
764_Wreath Comfey.description: This Pokémon smells very nice. All comfey wear different kinds of wreaths, so each one has its own individual Christmas scent.

771_Lights Pyukumuku.name: Lights Pyukumuku
771_Lights Pyukumuku.description: They will get on land during Christmas eve to shine its lights on the back. They go back to the sea after New Year’s eve.

774_Rainbow Minior.name: Rainbow Minior
774_Rainbow Minior.description: Although its outer shell is uncommonly durable, the shock of falling to the ground smashes the shell to smithereens, revealing its mesmerizing colourful patterns underneath.

775_Presents Komala.name: Presents Komala
775_Presents Komala.description: It remains asleep from birth to death as a result of the sedative music of Christmas that it hears all year long.

777_Easter Togedemaru.name: Easter Togedemaru
777_Easter Togedemaru.description: When it's surprised or excited, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up and light up in different colours.

778_Busted Mimikyu.name: Busted Mimikyu
778_Busted Mimikyu.description: It has taken damage and can no longer hold the head of its cloth disguise upright. For as long as it lives, Mimikyu will never forget its attacker.

779_Pride Queen Bruxish.name: Pride Queen Bruxish
779_Pride Queen Bruxish.description: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the sound of music and dance echoes through the area.

814_Relay Race Raboot.name: Relay Race Raboot
814_Relay Race Raboot.description: While it prides itself on its varied kicking moves, it can also run really fast once its flames have heated up its feet.

818_Fencinteleon.name: Fencinteleon
818_Fencinteleon.description: It uses special lenses in its eyes to sense things about its opponents—like their body heat—then poke once it identifies a weak spot.

819_Painted Acorn Skwovet.name: Painted Acorn Skwovet
819_Painted Acorn Skwovet.description: It eats all kinds of coloured berries nonstop—a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It'll show up on farms, searching for the brightest coloured berries.

830_Ornament Eldegoss.name: Ornament Eldegoss
830_Ornament Eldegoss.description: The ornament on the head of this Pokémon can be hung in the Christmas tree, shining bright.

840_Strawberry Shortcake Applin.name: Strawberry Shortcake Applin
840_Strawberry Shortcake Applin.description: It lives inside a slice of strawberry shortcake. When a Strawberry Shortcake Applin is separated from its slice, its body loses sugar and the Pokémon grows weak.

841_Pear Flapple.name: Pear Flapple
841_Pear Flapple.description: During the harvest season when an Applin evolves, it chooses the best fruit of the season. Humans watch evolving Applins carefully to determine what the fruit of the year will be.

842_Cake Appletun.name: Cake Appletun
842_Cake Appletun.description: Its body is covered with icing, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack at Christmas.

848_Boxel.name: Boxel
848_Boxel.description: It stores poison in an internal poison sac and secretes that poison through its skin. You better not touch its skin during the fight!

854_Good Luck Sinistea.name: Good Luck Sinistea
854_Good Luck Sinistea.description: During St Patrick's Day, Sinistea will "drown the shamrock" in its tea before throwing it over the shoulder for good luck.

855_Kettle Polteageist.name: Kettle Polteageist
855_Kettle Polteageist.description: Though risky to drink, this Pokémon’s campfire-boiled tea tastes delicious. Gourmets who have no fear of danger drink its tea day after day.

859_Elf Impidimp.name: Elf Impidimp
859_Elf Impidimp.description: It sneaks into people’s homes, puts presents underneath the Christmas tree and leaves via the chimney again.

861_Grinchsnarl.name: Grinchsnarl
861_Grinchsnarl.description: It lives deep within the forest. Even after evolving into this splendid form, it hasn’t given up on its mischievous antics and holiday pranks.

863_Cosy Perrserker.name: Cosy Perrserker
863_Cosy Perrserker.description: This Pokémon lives for the thrill of colder times. It drinks hot choco while watching the leaves fall.

869_Cupcake Alcremie.name: Cupcake Alcremie
869_Cupcake Alcremie.description: When Alcremie is content, it magically makes cupcakes for all to share.

870_Dango Falinks.name: Dango Falinks
870_Dango Falinks.description: The leader dango, distinguished by the number of strawberries, uses the skewer to signal the others when it's time to rearrange.

901_Barbarian Bloodmoon Ursaluna.name: Barbarian Bloodmoon Ursaluna
901_Barbarian Bloodmoon Ursaluna.description: It survived many hunts that led it to take on a unique appearance and gain special powers.

903_Snow Leopard Sneasler.name: Snow Leopard Sneasler
903_Snow Leopard Sneasler.description: This catlike subspecies of Sneasler has further adapted to its frozen climate, becoming an even more elusive, deadly predator.

910_Proud Crocalor.name: Proud Crocalor
910_Proud Crocalor.description: This Crocalor loves camping, and is an expert at starting fires. It wears a hat to protect other camp members from getting burned when they stand close.

915_Egg Forager Lechonk.name: Egg Forager Lechonk
915_Egg Forager Lechonk.description: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging chocolate eggs.

924_Pride Tandemaus.name: Pride Tandemaus
924_Pride Tandemaus.description: Tandemaus stick together no matter what. They help others and stay in contact throughout their whole lives.

925_Marshmallow Maushold.name: Marshmallow Maushold
925_Marshmallow Maushold.description: The larger marshmallows protect the little ones during battles. When facing other opponents, they use gooey melted marshmallow strings to trap them in battle.

926_Hearts Fidough.name: Hearts Fidough
926_Hearts Fidough.description: This Pokémon is sweet, and smooth to the touch. Fragrance in Fidough’s breath attracts customers into the bakery.

927_Autumn Dachsbun.name: Autumn Dachsbun
927_Autumn Dachsbun.description: The leaves on the surface of this Pokémon’s skin change colour as Autumn rolls around, and its body has the soothing aroma of maple.

928_Christmas Tree Smoliv.name: Christmas Tree Smoliv
928_Christmas Tree Smoliv.description: This Pokémon converts snowflakes into baubles, which it stores in pine trees. It can easily go a whole week dancing around Christmas trees out of joy.

fields.Evolution: **Christmas Tree Smoliv** evolves to **Christmas Tree Dolliv** starting from level 25, which evolves to **Christmas Tree Arboliva** starting from level 35.

929_Christmas Tree Dolliv.name: Christmas Tree Dolliv
929_Christmas Tree Dolliv.description: It basks in the light of the stars to its heart’s content until the star on its head shines bright. After that, Christmas Tree Dolliv places the star on top of a decorated pine tree and goes on a journey for a new star.

fields.Evolution: **Christmas Tree Dolliv** evolves from **Christmas Tree Smoliv** starting from level 25 and evolves to **Christmas Tree Arboliva** starting from level 35.

930_Christmas Tree Arboliva.name: Christmas Tree Arboliva
930_Christmas Tree Arboliva.description: This Pokémon gathers friends by launching its rich, shiny lights at them and pulling them closer to itself.

fields.Evolution: **Christmas Tree Arboliva** evolves from **Christmas Tree Dolliv** starting from level 35, which evolves from **Christmas Tree Smoliv** starting from level 25.

932_Mushroom Nacli.name: Mushroom Nacli
932_Mushroom Nacli.description: The ground scrapes its body as it travels, causing it to leave mushroom pieces and grass behind. Mushrooms are always being grown and replenished inside Nacli’s body.

939_Onigiri Bellibolt.name: Onigiri Bellibolt
939_Onigiri Bellibolt.description: When this Pokémon expands and contracts its rice-y body, the seaweed on its stomach keeps the rice from popping out.

945_Raincoat Grafaiai.name: Raincoat Grafaiai
945_Raincoat Grafaiai.description: Every Grafaiai dresses for each occasion to paint its individual patterns all over the city.

959_Pride Tinkaton.name: Pride Tinkaton
959_Pride Tinkaton.description: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It loves to dare people to take its flag. Whoever loses, gets a firm hug.

960_Candy Cane Wiglett.name: Candy Cane Wiglett
960_Candy Cane Wiglett.description: Though they look like candy canes, Candy Cane Wiglett is a living pokémon. The resemblance seems to be a coincidental result of festive adaptation.

962_Love Bombirdier.name: Love Bombirdier
962_Love Bombirdier.description: Bombirdier uses the apron on its chest to bundle up baby Pokémon, which it carries to their parents.

965_Train Varoom.name: Train Varoom
965_Train Varoom.description: The steel section is Train Varoom’s actual body. This Pokémon pulls The Poké Express to the North Pole during Christmas!

999_Gingerbread Gimmighoul.name: Gingerbread Gimmighoul
999_Gingerbread Gimmighoul.description: It lives inside a gingerbread house. Sometimes it gets left in gift shop corners during the holidays since no one realizes it’s actually a Pokémon.

146_Olympic Flame Moltres.name: Olympic Flame Moltres
146_Olympic Flame Moltres.description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Moltres is the perfect Pokémon to carry the Olympic Flame into the stadium.

151_Pride Mew.name: Pride Mew
151_Pride Mew.description: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokémon and being neither male nor female at heart.

491_Error Darkrai.name: Error Darkrai
491_Error Darkrai.description: In a world dominated by AI, a powerful Darkrai is trapped in a decaying virtual Pokémon battle system. Twisted by data corruption, it moves between reality and broken digital realms, dragging victims into a fractured dreamscape.

493_Glitched Beta Arceus.name: Glitched Beta Arceus
493_Glitched Beta Arceus.description: In an alternate universe, Glitched Beta Arceus emerged from equations which it bends to shape the world in bits and bytes.

493_Pride Arceus.name: Pride Arceus
493_Pride Arceus.description: It is said to have emerged from a rainbow in a place where there was nothing, then shaped the world.

719_Spring Blooming Diancie.name: Spring Blooming Diancie
719_Spring Blooming Diancie.description: It can instantly create many flowers by shaking its head to throw out seeds from the big flower on its head.

789_Fireworks Cosmog.name: Fireworks Cosmog
789_Fireworks Cosmog.description: Its body is gaseous and frail. During the Holiday celebrations, it grows fast as it collects all the firework dust from the atmosphere.

795_Flower Pheromosa.name: Flower Pheromosa
795_Flower Pheromosa.description: Although it's alien to this world, It's enjoying the sunny fashion for this Spring.

806_Corrupted Blacephalon.name: Corrupted Blacephalon
806_Corrupted Blacephalon.description: An error caused by corrupted ultra wormholes makes its explosions stronger than any before it.

893_Druid Zarude.name: Druid Zarude
893_Druid Zarude.description: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a grove with others of its kind. It’s focused on the health of the forest and sees it as its purpose to keep the forest alive.

1004_Gradient Chi-Yu.name: Gradient Chi-Yu
1004_Gradient Chi-Yu.description: It controls the colours of flames burning at over 3,000 degrees Celsius. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.
